Replace.Text: The unit causes full damage to the city defense
{LOC_CIVIC_NATIONALISM_NAME}: Unit +7[ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -3[ICON_Gold] gold coins (maintenance fee) per turn[ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_CIVIC_MOBILIZATION_NAME}: Unit +10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -3[ICON_Gold] gold coins (maintenance fee) per turn[ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_TECH_IRON_WORKING_NAME}: Unit +16[ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -1[ICON_Gold] gold coin (maintenance fee) per turn[ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_TECH_APPRENTICESHIP_NAME}: Unit +9[ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -1[ICON_Gold] gold coin (maintenance fee) per turn[ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_TECH_GUNPOWDER_NAME}: Unit +10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -1[ICON_Gold] gold coin (maintenance fee) per turn[ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_TECH_MILITARY_SCIENCE_NAME}: Unit +10[ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -1[ICON_Gold] gold coin (maintenance fee) per turn[ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_TECH_REPLACEABLE_PARTS_NAME}: Unit +10 [ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] -1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin (maintenance fee) per turn [ENDCOLOR]
{LOC_TECH_COMPOSITES_NAME}: Unit +25 [ICON_Strength] combat strength, [COLOR: ResMilitaryLabelCS] -1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin (maintenance fee) per round [ENDCOLOR]
Temporarily mobilized Tactical Doll, capable of causing full damage to city walls[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

It can cause full damage to the city wall only through simulation training, improvement through the use of combat records, or a Tactical Doll (?) that does not eat, drink or provide ammunition with blood and sweat.
Tactical dolls that have undergone simulation training and have some actual combat experience can cause full damage to city walls.
A well-equipped and combat-experienced T-Doll capable of causing full damage to city walls.

Temporarily mobilized tactical dolls responsible for logistics, regular tactical dolls, with [ICON_Range] [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with a range of 2, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]Researching {LOC_TECH_IRON_WORKING_NAME} and {LOC_TECH_APPRENTICESHIP_NAME} can increase the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

It is only improved through simulation training or through the use of combat records, or it is a tactical doll that flies with blood and sweat from a certain tactical doll (?) who does not eat, drink or provide ammunition. It is a regular tactical doll with an [ICON_Range] of 2. ICON_Ranged] long-range combat effectiveness, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat effectiveness is weak[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]Researching {LOC_TECH_MILITARY_SCIENCE_NAME} can improve the unit's combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

A tactical doll that has passed simulation training and has some actual combat experience. It is a regular tactical doll. It has [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with an [ICON_Range] range of 2, but the [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak.

A well-equipped tactical doll with rich combat experience, a regular tactical doll with [ICON_Range] range of 2 and [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power, but [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power is weak.
Create a new heavily armed tactical humanoid team

A factory-new T-Doll from Heavy Construction that has not passed any testing. It has thicker armor than regular T-Dolls and has [ICON_Ranged] ranged combat power of [ICON_Range] of 1, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement[NEWLINE][ COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]
Experienced heavily armored tactical humanoid squad

A T-Doll that is only improved through simulation training or through the use of combat records, or a T-Doll (?) who does not eat, drink or provide ammunition with blood and sweat. It has thicker armor than regular T-Dolls and has [ICON_Range ][ICON_Ranged] ranged combat power with range 1, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement

Tactical Dolls that have passed simulation training and have some actual combat experience. They have thicker armor than regular Tactical Dolls and have [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power with an [ICON_Range] range of 1, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement.

A well-equipped and combat-experienced Tactical Doll, with thicker armor than regular Tactical Dolls, and a [ICON_Ranged] long-range combat power of [ICON_Range] of 1, but [ICON_Movement] slow movement
Recruiting a Reconnaissance Tactical Humanoid Team

Temporarily mobilize tactical dolls responsible for logistics, with extra vision, and the vision can pass through any terrain. The unit [ICON_Movement] moves without terrain penalty[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

Only through simulation training or through the use of combat records, or through the blood and sweat of a certain Tactical Doll (?) who does not eat, drink or give ammunition, it has extra vision, and the vision can pass through any terrain, units [ICON_Movement]Move without terrain penalty

Tactical dolls that have gone through simulation training and have some actual combat experience. They have extra vision and can pass through any terrain. The unit [ICON_Movement] moves without terrain penalty.
A well-equipped and combat-experienced tactical doll with additional vision that can pass through any terrain. The unit [ICON_Movement] moves without terrain penalty.

Temporarily mobilized tactical dolls responsible for logistics, with [ICON_Range][ICON_Ranged] range attack of 3, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] but extremely low melee combat effectiveness[NEWLINE]This unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

A Tactical Doll that is only improved through simulation training or through the use of combat records, or a Tactical Doll (?) that does not eat, drink, or provide ammunition, and has a [ICON_Ranged] long-range attack with an [ICON_Range] range of 3. [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]But the melee combat effectiveness is extremely low[ENDCOLOR]

A tactical doll that has passed simulation training and has some actual combat experience. It has [ICON_Range] and [ICON_Ranged] remote attacks with a range of 4, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] but its melee combat effectiveness is extremely low[ENDCOLOR]
A well-equipped and combat-experienced tactical doll with [ICON_Range] and [ICON_Ranged] range attack of 4, [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] but extremely low melee combat effectiveness[ENDCOLOR]

Factory new Tactical T-Doll from Heavy Construction, has not passed any testing, has [ICON_Range] [ICON_Bombard] bombardment attack with a range of 2, +12 [ICON_Strength] combat strength against cavalry [NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] This unit cannot gain any experience [ENDCOLOR]

Only through simulation training or through the use of combat records, or through the blood and sweat of a certain Tactical Doll (?) who does not eat, drink or give ammunition, it has an [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with an [ICON_Range] range of 3. +12[ICON_Strength] combat strength against cavalry

A tactical doll that has undergone simulation training and has some actual combat experience. It has an [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with an [ICON_Range] range of 4, and has +12 [ICON_Strength] combat power against cavalry.

A well-equipped and combat-experienced tactical doll with [ICON_Bombard] bombing attack with [ICON_Range] of 5, +12[ICON_Strength] combat power against cavalry, and +67[ICON_Strength] combat power against doomsday mechas.
It has a lively and cute personality, with a very clingy and loyal dog attribute. It will definitely complete the orders it accepts, and likes the commander to pat its head as a reward.

A timid and easily shy humanoid girl, she is a delusional person who is addicted to her own delusions. She often talks to herself about her thoughts endlessly, and will be at a loss once she finds out that she is overheard by others. But if she is forced into a "desperate situation"... please be prepared that the situation will be uncontrollable.

Unable to build all land units and pioneers in the original version, but able to build Tactical Dolls and Crawlers[NEWLINE] All military units have +50% combat experience, but [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] Some Tactical Dolls cannot gain experience[ENDCOLOR]
Specialized pioneers with certain defensive abilities cannot use melee attacks. This unit [COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS] is very expensive [ENDCOLOR], but the price will never increase

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB_NAME}, which is cheaper to build, has +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade capacity after completion, and gives a merchant unit with a unique [ICON_Gold] gold adjacent bonus. After researching {LOC_TECH_IRON_WORKING_NAME}, the [ICON_Gold] gold adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Production] productivity. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_ENCAMPMENT_NAME}, initially unlocked, can be built around the city center, has a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus, and when built will release the crawlers consumed when creating the city. The area only has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 3 [ICON_Ranged] remote attacks

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE_NAME}, requires {LOC_TECH_INDUSTRIALIZATION_NAME}, is free and never increases in price, and has a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack
+{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production comes from each adjacent area
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold coins from each adjacent area
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food comes from each adjacent area
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold coins come from strategic resources
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] gold coins come from luxury resources

The city will not be war-weary, units do not need to be garrisoned to regenerate health at the beginning of the round, improved cells have +3 [ICON_Gold] gold coins, +1 [icon_Faith] faith, and +2 [ICON_Production] productivity after researching {LOC_TECH_ELECTRICITY_NAME}.

He is a lively, flamboyant, and conceited humanoid who likes to tell others what to do. However, he stays quiet during battle and uses exaggerated gestures instead, so he can be considered a serious and responsible fighter.

Cities will not be war-weary, units do not need to be garrisoned to regenerate health at the beginning of the round, all cities you create or capture will have a trading post from the beginning, and after creating a trade route, a trading post will immediately appear in the destination city. In-territorial espionage -4 levels, +1 diplomatic visibility each for researching {LOC_TECH_STIRRUPS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_BALLISTICS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME} and {LOC_TECH_COMPOSITES_NAME}
of the Forward Readiness Force Intelligence Center
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center Intelligence Advantage Level 1
Research {LOC_TECH_STIRRUPS_NAME} to gain an intelligence advantage with the Griffin Intelligence Center Division's Tactical Humanoid Leader
A reporter from your intelligence center reported a news story
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center Intelligence Advantage Level 2
Gain an intelligence advantage by researching {LOC_TECH_BALLISTICS_NAME} using the Griffin Intelligence Center Division's Tactical Humanoid Leader
An informant from your intelligence center has heard
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center intelligence advantage level 3
Research {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME} to gain an intelligence advantage with the Griffin Intelligence Center Division's Tactical Humanoid Leader
Diplomats from your intelligence center report to
Griffin Forward Readiness Intelligence Center Intelligence Advantage Level 4
Gain an intelligence advantage by researching {LOC_TECH_COMPOSITES_NAME} using the Griffin Intelligence Center Division's Tactical Humanoid Leader
A secret telegram from your intelligence center

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_CAMPUS_NAME} and unlocks {LOC_TECH_IRRIGATION_NAME}, which is free and never increases in price and has the unique [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus. [ICON_Food] Food adjacent bonuses also provide [ICON_Science] research and [ICON_Gold] gold coins. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE_NAME}, which is cheaper to build and provides +1 [ICON_Power] to all cities upon completion, with a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus. The [ICON_Production] productivity bonus also provides [ICON_Gold] gold coins. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Her words and deeds are elegant and steady, full of aristocratic temperament, and she has a strong sense of honor. Her commanding tone can be a bit condescending, but her rich and skilled experience and strength are deeply admired and relied upon by everyone.

A frivolous, arrogant, self-respecting humanoid who likes to point fingers at things around him. In fact, he is a good old man who loves to worry. Every statement about combat seems arrogant, but with her unfathomable strength and experience, it will eventually turn into something possible.

Since the files on the original project have been erased, HS.50 knows very little about her past, so she hopes to integrate into Griffin as soon as possible. But it seems that due to the influence of the past, she only knows how to use simple tactical skills to deal with daily life, which makes it difficult for her to get along with her companions. Currently, HS.50 is working hard to become more user-friendly.

Temporarily mobilize tactical dolls responsible for logistics. When attacking, -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power. Looting only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15[ICON_Range] ranged combat power to the adjacent Tactical Humanoid team, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move from the side of this unit, it will gain +1[ICON_Movement] movement power[NEWLINE][COLOR:ResMilitaryLabelCS]. Unit cannot gain any experience[ENDCOLOR]

It is only improved through simulation training or through the use of combat records, or it is a Tactical Doll (?) that does not eat, drink or provide ammunition. It is a Tactical Doll that flies with blood and sweat. When attacking, -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and plundering only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement]Movement. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to the adjacent Tactical Humanoid team, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.

Tactical dolls that have passed simulation training and have some actual combat experience have -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and plunder only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to the adjacent Tactical Humanoid team, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.

A well-equipped and combat-experienced tactical doll, with -25 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and plundering only consumes 1 [ICON_Movement] movement power. Provides +15 [ICON_Range] long-range combat power to the adjacent Tactical Humanoid team, and increases the healing effect of adjacent units. If any unit starts to move next to this unit, it will gain +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.
Provides +15[ICON_Range] ranged combat power to the tactical humanoid team within 1 square
+3 vision range and passes through all terrains, able to detect invisible units within the field of view
+2[ICON_Movement] movement power, all formation units gain [ICON_Movement] movement power of accompanying units

A cute, smart, and somewhat narcissistic humanoid. The source of his confidence is not his strength, but his unique vision. On weekdays, he is good at acting coquettishly and telling jokes, but in battle, he can remain calm and not get discouraged even if he encounters a defeat.
+{1_Amount}[ICON_Strength] ranged combat strength from adjacent support Tactical T-Dolls
{1_Amount}[ICON_Strength] combat strength, derived from supporting tactical humanoid characteristics

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_CAMPUS_NAME}, requires {LOC_TECH_WRITING_NAME}, is cheaper, has a unique [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus, [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Science] research, research {LOC_TECH_IRON_WORKING_NAME}, [ICON_Gold] gold coin Adjacent bonuses also provide [ICON_Production] productivity. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

Replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_SPACEPORT_NAME}, initially unlocked, cost is free and will never increase in price, can be built regardless of population demand (not a specialized area), has a unique [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus, has five [ICON_Citizen] expert slots, Research {LOC_CIVIC_GUILDS_NAME}, +100% [ICON_Production] productivity adjacent bonus. The area has 20 [ICON_Fortified] garrison health points. After the city has city walls, it can perform [ICON_Range] range of 1 [ICON_Ranged] remote attack

The city will not be war-weary, and units do not need to be stationed to recover health at the beginning of the round. All cells in the city will receive +4 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. After researching {LOC_TECH_ECONOMICS_NAME}, +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins will be added.
